projects.title: Advent of Code
projects.description: Working on daily challenges really got me excited and helped me to improve my coding skills on a daily basis with the clear objection to find a solution in the end of the day.

projects.title: Dutch Mobility Hackathon
projects.description: On our journey in finding solutions to disentangle the public transport network in The Netherlands we decided to focus on the role of private car pooling in the future of mobility and how to make it more accessible

projects.title: WevsVirus Hackathon
projects.description: Minimizing the number of customers in grocery stores during the pandemic was the core problem we were focussing during #WirVsVirus.

projects.title: Hackthecrisis
projects.description: In this Hackathon, my team chose to pursue the EduTech challenge. We came up with an approach to motivate low-and middle school students during the pandemic.

projects.title: HACKATRAIN
projects.description: In our vision we are using low-latency 5G for in-train passsenger communcation on an autonomous train that can detect dangerous blaadjes on the tracks.
